name: depersonalized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
depersonalize
to remove from a person, organization, object, etc. the qualities or features that make them particular or special: He thinks that wearing uniforms at school depersonalizes children. Synonym
objectifyOpposite
personalize
